name: Access Requirement
description: This table contains the access requirements to enter an instance.

fields.name: Level Min
fields.help: The minimum level that you must be in order to enter the instance.

fields.name: Level Max
fields.help: The maximum level that you can be in order to enter the instance.

fields.name: Item Level
fields.help: Minimum item level to enter the instance

fields.name: Item
fields.help: An item that you must have in your inventory to enter the instance. This item can not be in the bank.

fields.name: Item 2
fields.help: A second item that you must have in your inventory. This item can not be in the bank.

fields.name: Quest Done (Ally)
fields.help: A quest that you must have completed. This field is only for alliance.

fields.name: Quest Done (Horde)
fields.help: A quest that you must have completed. This field is only for horde.

fields.name: Completed Achievement
fields.help: An achievement that must be completed by the player to enter an instance.

fields.name: Quest Failed Text
fields.help: The text that is shown if you try and enter the instance without having completed the quest.

fields.name: Comment
fields.help: This field is for any comment you want to make about the requirements. It is arbitrary text.
